description: Derived from the 996 working hour system (9am to 9pm, 6 days a week). Alibaba founder Jack Ma controversially called this grueling schedule a 「blessing」 (福报) for young workers.

examples.translation: 996 blessing huh, 8th consecutive day of work

examples.chinese: 货车司机连开10个小时叫疲劳驾驶,打工人996却叫福报,就是双标
examples.translation: Truck drivers driving 10 hours is called fatigue driving, but workers doing 996 is called a blessing, pure double standards

examples.chinese: 员工因加班过劳死正在不断增加,996.007到底是谁的福报
examples.translation: Employees dying from overwork is increasing, whose blessing is 996/007 really?
